short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter PR comments by author in Bitbucket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitbucket PR Comment Filter helps you filter comments in Bitbucket pull requests by author, making PR reviews more efficient. Simply enter one or more usernames, and the extension will hide all other comments, allowing you to focus on the relevant discussions. You can also save a default username for quick access, and reset the filters with a single click. Notifications are provided when filters are applied or reset.

Features:

Filter comments by one or more usernames.
Save a default username for easier filtering.
Reset all filters to view all comments.
Simple, intuitive interface with real-time notifications.
Ideal for developers and reviewers who work with large PRs and need a streamlined view of relevant discussions.
